title: Quiz  - SchemesTap 1st to 15th April 2023
instruction: Taking steps forward towards the vision of an ‘Aatmanirbhar Bharat’, Government led by Hon’ble Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, has approved the PLI Scheme for Textiles for MMF Apparel, MMF Fabrics and 10 segments/ products of Technical Textiles. PLI scheme for Textiles will promote production of high value MMF Fabric, Garments and Technical Textiles in country. The incentive structure has been so formulated that industry will be encouraged to invest in fresh capacities in these segments. This will give a major push to growing high value MMF segment which will complement the efforts of cotton and other natural fibre-based textiles industry in generating new opportunities for employment and trade, resultantly helping India regain its historical dominant status in global textiles trade.

quiz.text: PM-JAY provides a health cover of Rs. ______ per year per family irrespective of number of family members.
options: 1 Lakh
2 Lakh
3 Lakh
4 Lakh
5 Lakh

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to PM-JAY?

A. It is a Centrally Sponsored Scheme

B. The households included are based on the deprivation and occupational criteria of Socio-Economic Caste Census 2011 (SECC 2011) for rural and urban areas respectively.

C. It covers up to 3 days of pre-hospitalization and 7 days post-hospitalization
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which scheme has been described in the above passage?
options: Atal Bhujal Yojana
Jal Jeevan Mission
National Rural Drinking Water Programme
AMRUT 2.0
Swachh Bharat Mission (Gramin)

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements are correct with respect to the above-mentioned scheme?

A. Total estimated cost of this scheme is Rs 3.60 Lakh Crore.

B. Tap water supply is to be provided to all rural SC/ST households.

C.  Minimum water supply to be available is 55 litres per person per day.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following is not a component under the scheme described above?
options: Retrofitting of completed and ongoing schemes to provide FHTCs at minimum service level of 45 lpcd.
Greywater management
Technological interventions for removal of contaminants where water quality is an issue.
Wherever necessary, bulk water transfer, treatment plants and distribution network to cater to every rural household.
Support activities, i.e. water quality laboratories, water quality testing & surveillance, R&D, knowledge centre, capacity building of communities, etc.

quiz.text: Recently (February 2022), the _______ district from Himachal Pradesh has become 100th district to have provided tap water connection to all rural households.
options: Bilaspur
Dharmshala
Solan
Chamba
Hamirpur

quiz.text: The scheme discussed in the paragraph is being implemented by which of the following ministries/organisations?

quiz.text:
This umbrella scheme constitutes of 3 sub-schemes, namely-

options: A and B

quiz.text: The above mentioned scheme has a target to achieve reductions upto ____% or achievement of National Ambient Air Quality Standards for particulate matter (PM 10) concentration by __________.

40, 2025-26
20, 2022-23

40, 2023-24

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the implementation of the above scheme?

A. At the National level - an apex committee at the Environment Ministry level.

B. At the State level - committees at the Chief Secretary level will oversee implementation.

C. Implementation of the city specific action plans are regularly monitored by Committees at Central and State level namely Steering Committee, Monitoring Committee and Implementation Committee.
options: A and B

None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is incorrect with respect to the PLI Scheme for Drones and Drone Components?
options: The scheme envisages for the financial allocation of Rs. 120 crore spread over 3 financial years
PLI for a manufacturer has been capped at 15% of total annual outlay
Incentive for a manufacturer will be 20% of the value addition
Ministry of Civil Aviation acts as the nodal ministry under this scheme
Value addition is the "annual sales revenue (net of GST) - the purchase cost (net of GST)"

quiz.text: The eligibility criterion for MSME and Start-ups (in terms of annual sales turnover) is Rs. _______ (for Drone manufacturers) and Rs. _______ (for Drone component manufacturer
options: 1 Crore, 50 Lakh
2 Crore, 1 Crore
4 Crore, 2 Crore
2 Crore, 50 Lakh
4 Crore, 1 Crore

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. PLI rate has been kept constant at 20% for all 3 years

B. Minimum value addition norm is 50% of net sales

C. If a manufacturer fails to meet the threshold for the eligible value addition for a particular financial year, he/she will be allowed to claim the lost incentive in the subsequent year
options: B and C
A and B
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is incorrect with respect to the ‘Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Urban’?
options: PMAY-U was launched in the year 2015.
Central Grant is of Rs. 1 Lakh per house for in-situ rehabilitation of slum dwellers.
Families having only one pucca house can avail benefit under this scheme.
It is implemented as Centrally Sponsored Scheme except for the Credit Linked Subsidy component which is a Central Sector Scheme.
None of the above

Credit Linked Subsidy Scheme (CLSS)
Affordable Housing in Partnership (AHP)
Beneficiary-led Individual House Construction/ Enhancement (BLC-N/BLC-E)
All of the above

3%, 18 lakh

6.5%, 6 lakh
5.4%, 8 lakh

options: Rs. 55 thousand

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Health and Family Welfare.

B. It is a Centrally Sponsored Scheme.

C. It aims to improve primary, and secondary healthcare systems.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: What is the total outlay of scheme mentioned in above paragraph?
options: Rs. 18549 Crore
Rs. 29487 Crore

Rs. 51978 Crore
Rs. 64180 Crore

quiz.text: Which among the following is not one of the interventions under the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: Support for 17,788 rural Health and Wellness Centres in in 10 High Focus States
Establishing 21,024 urban Health and Wellness Centres in all the States
Setting up of Integrated Public Health Labs in all districts and 3382 Block Public Health Units in11 High Focus states
Strengthening of the National Centre for Disease Control (NCDC), its 5 regional branches and 20 metropolitan health surveillance units
Setting up of 15 Health Emergency Operation Centres and 2 mobile hospitals

quiz.text:

quiz.text: On timely or early repayment of the loan, an interest subsidy of ____ per annum is credited to the bank accounts of beneficiaries through Direct Benefit Transfer.

6.25%
7.0%
7.5%

quiz.text: With respect to the above scheme, which of the following statements is incorrect?

With the extension of scheme till December 2024, loan amount has increased to ₹8,100 crore.
Monthly cashback in the range of Rs. 50 to 100 is provided on digital transactions.

quiz.text: Which scheme has been talked about in the above paragraph?

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to the above scheme?

A. The scheme is implemented by Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas.

B. Initially, the scheme targeted to provide 8 crore LPG connections, which was extended to 12 crore.

C. Financial support of Rs. 3000 per LPG connection.
options: Only A
Only B

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the PMUY?

A. Only the BPL ration card will be considered for the purpose of family identification

B. Aadhar card is mandatory for enrolment in all States/Union territories

C. In case of no adult female member available, a joint LPG connection can be issued in the name of eldest male family member along with a minor female member of the house
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

B. It was launched in the year 2018.

Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the features of the above scheme?

A. Compressed Bio-Gas (CBS) plants are proposed to be set up mainly through independent entrepreneurs.

quiz.text:

quiz.text: What is the total budgetary outlay for the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?

quiz.text:
Which among the following statements are correct with respect to the eligibility for the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?

A. Priority will be given to investment in Aspirational Districts, Tier 3, Tier 4 towns and rural areas.

B. Any person or company willing to invest a minimum of Rs 300 crore in plant, machinery, equipment and civil works (excluding land and administrative building cost) to produce products of MMF fabrics, garments and products of technical textiles will be eligible to participate in first part of scheme.

C. Investors willing to spend a minimum of Rs 100 crore under the same conditions (as in the case of the first part) shall be eligible to apply for second part of scheme.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above
